titles.title: A resolution honoring the 100th anniversary of the establishment of Glacier National Park.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/10/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Urges the people of the United States to observe and celebrate the 100th anniversary of the establishment of Glacier National Park in Montana on May 11, 2010.
